title: From Being Grandpa - Novel Updates
genre: Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Cute Children   Easy Going Life   Economics   Familial Love   Family   Male Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Wealthy Characters
author: 黑色墨汁
description:
Zhang Ran was reborn in 1967 in this parallel world very similar to his previous life with memories of his previous life.

On May 19, 1990, Zhang Ran finished his overseas business trip and returned to China on a luxury cruise ship with full expectation and joy.

After the cruise ship traveled through a cloud of fog, Zhang Ran discovered that the time was directly in 2018, and their cruise ship had arrived 28 years later.

‘Overnight’, Zhang Ran’s originally lonely account suddenly added sons, daughters-in-law, daughters, grandsons, and granddaughters.>
